notes: Version 1.2.1 - Discord-Style Screen Sharing & Enhanced Video Communication. Major new feature: Full Discord-style screen sharing with monitor/application selection and desktop audio capture. Screen sharing seamlessly replaces webcam streams with smooth transitions. New focused stream view - click any user's webcam or screen share to expand it fullscreen in the chat area. Right-click context menus for muting and volume controls. Backend improvements include proper screen share state synchronization across all clients and new WebSocket events for screen share signaling. All features maintain the app's sleek design language with fluid animations and responsive UI. Zero breaking changes - fully backward compatible with 1.2.0.
